headline: GoPro and ASUS Co-Branded ProArt Laptop Available Globally
summary: GoPro, Inc. (NASDAQ: GPRO) and ASUS today announced global availability of the ProArt GoPro Limited Edition (PX13) convertible laptop, with U.S. availability exclusively at Best Buy for $2,999. The CES Innovation Award-winning laptop was developed through a close collaboration between GoPro and ASUS to streamline the storytelling journey from capture to edit–combining GoPro's creator-first, go-anywhere DNA with ASUS' powerful, professional-ready hardware.
